name: AssociateAutomationActionWithService
description:
Associate an Automation Action with a service.

This tool is used to associate a specified Automation Action with a service in PagerDuty. Call this tool when you need to link an action to a service for automation purposes.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the resource to be associated with the service.

parameters.name: accept_version_header
parameters.description: Specify the versioning for the API request using the `Accept` header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specifies the format of the request body. Use 'application/json'.

parameters.name: automation_service_association_request
parameters.description: JSON object containing details of the automation action and service to associate.
